com.hp.mss.hpprint.util

Class PrintUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hp.mss.hpprint.util.PrintUtil

  • public class PrintUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    In order to print, you need to call the print(Activity) method in this class. It automatically creates the print preview activity for KitKat devices. It also helps you install/detect print plugins.

    You will need to set the printJobData in order to invoke the print method.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  PrintUtil.PrintMetricsListener
      This interface exists in order to pass print metrics back to the calling activity.

    • Method Detail

      • print

        public static void print(Activity activity)
        Call to start the HP Print SDK print flow.
        Parameters:
        activity - The calling activity.

      • createPrintJob

        public static void createPrintJob(Activity activity)
        Directly create the android PrintJob. This should not be needed except for special circumstances. Please use the print(Activity) method.
        Parameters:
        activity - The calling activity.

      • setPrintJobData

        public static void setPrintJobData(PrintJobData printJobData)
        Sets the printJobData.
        Parameters:
        printJobData - The print job data object that you want to use.

      • getPrintJobData

        public static PrintJobData getPrintJobData()
        Gets the printJobData.
        Returns:
        The printJobData that is set using setPrintJobData(PrintJobData) otherwise it will return null.
